Building outputs
================
Tally currently supports Excel tables as outputs for client delivery, with Powerpoint documents and dashboard on their way.
Refer to the section :ref:`Build Excel tables` on how to creat builds.

.. currentmodule:: tally.build

Build
=====
The Build class represents an output to be built and represented to clients. Currently, only Excel files have been implemented but more build types are on the way.

.. autosummary::
    :toctree: generated/

    Build
    Build.add_sheet


Sheet
=====

.. autosummary::
    :toctree: generated/

    Sheet
    Sheet.add_table

Options
======

    :recursive:

    Options
